properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 15 at 1:29PM EST until February 16 at 3:18AM EST by NWS Charleston WV
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Ohio...
Kentucky...

Ohio River At Greenup Lock affecting Greenup and Scioto Counties.

Ohio River At Ashland affecting Greenup, Boyd and Lawrence
Counties.

...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Ohio...
Kentucky...West Virginia...

Ohio River At Point Pleasant affecting Gallia and Mason Counties.

For the Ohio River...Minor flooding is forecast.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Ohio River At Point Pleasant.
* Until late tonight.
* At 1:00 PM EST Saturday the stage was 41.4 feet.
* Flood stage is 40.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* Recent Activity...The river crested at 43.8 feet.
* Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late
this evening and continue falling to 26.6 feet Thursday morning.
* Impact...At 41.0 feet, The Addison, Blaville Road in Ohio is
flooded and low lying areas surrounding Point Pleasant and
vicinity are flooded due to backwater.
properties.instruction:
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive
cars through flooded areas.

This warning will be in effect until the river falls below its flood
stage.

Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.

Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood
deaths occur in vehicles.

Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/rlx.

The next statement will be issued late tonight at 130 AM EST.

NWSheadline: The Flood Warning remains in effect
